feed.title: Track FOSS for Dev Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A hub of Free and open-source software for developers

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Jan 29 - Feb 04, 2024
entry.content:
Collaboration Tools

  • Tolgee - Developer & translator friendly web-based localization platform

Security and PKI

  • Selefra (⭐537) - An open-source policy-as-code software that provides analytics for multi-cloud and SaaS.

PaaS

  • Preevy (⭐2.1k) - Provision preview environments for docker compose applications with minimal configuration
  • Zeabur - deploy your full stack apps and databases with one click

Backend

  • Hook0 Webhooks-as-a-service (WaaS) for developers to send and manage webhooks
  • Dokku - Heroku like environment
  • Keploy - A developer-centric backend testing tool which makes backend tests with built-in-mocks, faster than unit tests, from user traffic

Mail server

  • WildDuck Email Server - nodejs application to send emails (built for scale (needs more hand work to make it work)

Environment Manager Tools

  • DEM - DEM (Development Environment Manager) is an open source command line tool to manage containerized Development Environments.
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Jan 29 - Feb 04, 2024

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Mar 13 - Mar 19, 2023
entry.content:
File Management

  • Bat (⭐53k) - The fancy cat with syntax highlighting and effortless fuzzy searching to save development time.
  • Clifm (⭐1.4k) - The terminal is always in your reach when managing your files.
  • Clipboard (⭐5.3k) - Cut, copy, and paste anything, anywhere, anytime, all from the terminal.
  • fzf (⭐72k) - Fuzzy find anything in your directories.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Mar 13 - Mar 19, 2023

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Mar 21 - Mar 27, 2022
entry.content:
IDE

  • VsCodium - Fully FOSS alternative to vscode

CI / CD

  • drone.io - Open Source CI platform
  • Gitlab CI - Gitlab Ci

Bug trackers

  • Open Project - Project management platform (has features like jira and confluence)

Backend

  • Okteto - Kubernetes and Docker Compose Platform

Chat and Community

  • Matrix - Decentrialized End-to-End Encrypted Chat platform (you may want to use Element
  • Discourse - Community forum
  • Flarum - Community Forum (PHP based)

Mail server

  • Mailcow Email Server - Fully feature email server (for avarage use cases @lmtr0 recommends this one)
entry.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Mar 21 - Mar 27, 2022

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Dec 21 - Dec 27, 2020
entry.content:
IDE

  • Atom (⭐61k) - Opensource,fully-featured,hackable text editor for coding.
  • Brackets (⭐33k) - A modern and open-source code editor for HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Dec 21 - Dec 27, 2020

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Dec 14 - Dec 20, 2020
entry.content:
Documentation

  • Log4brains (⭐1.3k) - Docs-as-code knowledge base to manage Architecture Decision Records (ADR) for your project and publish them automatically as a static website
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Dec 14 - Dec 20, 2020

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Oct 05 - Oct 11, 2020
entry.content:
Feature management

  • Unleash (⭐12k) - Free open-source feature flag & toggle service. SDKs for all major languages.

entry.content:
Collaboration Tools

  • Filestash - A Dropbox-like web client where users can bring their own backend (FTP, SFTP, Webdav, S3, Minio, ...).

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Oct 15 - Oct 21, 2018
entry.content:
IDE

  • Visual Studio Code (⭐174k) - Fully-featured IDE with thousands of extensions, cross-platform app development (Microsoft extensions available for download for iOS and Android), desktop, web and cloud development, multi-language support (C#, C++, JavaScript, Python, PHP and more)

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on Jun 01 - Jun 07, 2015
entry.content:
Project management

  • Redmine (⭐5.7k) - a flexible project management web application written using Ruby on Rails
  • Phabricator (⭐12k) - an open source collection of web applications which help software companies build better software
  • Taiga.io - Your Agile, Free and Open Source Project Management Tool
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 01 - Jun 07, 2015

entry.title: FOSS for Dev Updates on May 25 - May 31, 2015
entry.content:
Source Code Repos

  • GitLab (⭐24k) - Version control for your server

IDE

  • CodeBox (⭐4.1k) - Open source cloud & desktop IDE

Collaboration Tools

  • SparkleShare (⭐4.9k) - An Open Source collaboration and sharing tool
  • lets chat (⭐9.8k) - Self-hosted chat app for small teams

Code Quality

  • sonarqube (⭐9.7k) - Put your technical debt under control
  • gerrit - Code Review

CI / CD

  • Jenkins (⭐24k) - open-source continuous integration server
  • Travis CI (⭐8.5k) - Free continuous integration platform for GitHub projects

Security and PKI

  • Ralasafe - Access Control Middleware
  • OpenXPKI (⭐615) - an enterprise-grade PKI/Trustcenter software

Bug trackers

  • Bugzilla (⭐761) - web-based bug-tracking software
  • Mantis (⭐1.7k) - issue tracker that provides a delicate balance between simplicity and power

PaaS

  • OpenShift (⭐8.6k) - build, deploy, and manage your applications with Docker and Kubernetes
entry.summary: 13 awesome projects updated on May 25 - May 31, 2015
